com.xhSmart.controller
类 ProductController

java.lang.Object
  com.xhSmart.controller.ProductController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/product")
public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object

负责产品功能的处理

作者：
lin

@RequestMapping(value="/getAllProduct")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAll(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

@RequestMapping(value="/downProduct")
public void downDemand(int id,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

                       java.io.IOException

@RequestMapping(value="/delProduct")
public void delele(int id,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
删除产品

id - 产品id
request - Request对象

changeProductState

@RequestMapping(value="/changeProductState")
public void changeProductState(int id,
                                              int state,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
改变产品的状态

参数：
id - 产品id
state - 产品状态 0-开发中，1-测试中，2-已结束
request - Request对象
response - Response对象
